inlineScript: function onApply(game, parent) { var effect = parent.createEffect(); effect.getBonuses().addBonus('PhysicalResistance', 'Stackable', 25); effect.getBonuses().addBonus('ReflexResistance', 'Stackable', 25); parent.applyEffect(effect); }
name: Strength of Body
description: The monk has trained their body to be particularly resilient, gaining a +25 bonus to all Physical and Reflex Resistance checks.
